message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper focuses on natural language processing and learning the semantics of spatial relations from textual descriptions, which falls under the scope of cs.CL.
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - The paper proposes a novel multi-modal objective based on generating images of scenes from textual descriptions, which involves computer vision techniques and falls under the scope of cs.CV.
3. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper presents a system capable of capturing the semantics of spatial relations from natural language, which involves artificial intelligence techniques and falls under the scope of cs.AI.
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper proposes a new dataset and demonstrates that the internal representations are robust to meaning preserving transformations, which involves machine learning techniques and falls under the scope of cs.LG.
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper involves learning the semantics of spatial relations from textual descriptions, which is related to information retrieval and falls under the scope of cs.IR.
